title: DirectX error right after champ select
body:
So after updating my windows to the latest update on the 17th of Dec and updating my gtx 950 to its latest driver i keep getting a directX error saying something is wrong with my drivers and to make sure they are up to date (which all of them are) so i tried doing a rollback on the windows update and my graphics card and now im still getting the same error ive also deleted and reinstalled the drivers that didnt work, ive also deleted my imput and config files, then ran a full repair on league and still does not work and continues to give me the same error. any other help would be appreciated. i was able to play league just fine 4-5 days ago but since the updates i can no longer play...


update- while going into my devmgmt.msc and disabling my gtx 950 the game will launch but i will only get about 4fps then when i tab out and re enable my gtx 950 the screen will go black and thats it. i have no idea what to do at this point...lol

update #2- when running the game in fullscreen it will not launch and it will give me the error, but if i launch the game in windowed borderless it will work and ill have 60 frames with the graphics card enabled the only downside is that i have 3 monitors and i cannot move the camera correctly while playing windowed borderless... still open to any pointers.

update #3- so far the only temporary fix that ive found to be able to make it so i can play is i have to launch the game in windowed borderless fullscreen and disabling my other 2 monitors thats the only thing that works... but every other game i have works perfectly fine with my other monitors on and i get great frames.

replies.body: You've definitely tried a lot of steps here, sorry the issue is still happening.  :(  Directx errors are almost always driver related but there are additional steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide that may help.  Otherwise, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to collect some logs and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can dig into this with you individually.

I play with a dual monitor setup. When I first get into a match, my mouse is free to move between the two. When I click on the one I'm not playing on, then click back to league, it locks on league, and I have to alt tab to go back to my other monitor for side stuff.
Alas, I wish I had that luck haha, mine wont do that after reading your post. It still goes on to my other monitors.
